hero.headline: Fall footwear is in
hero.tagline: Waterproof boots and durable shoes to take rain, puddles and salty muck in stride.

promos.text: Stay dry top-to-bottom with waterproof jackets, pants, boots and more.
Don’t miss out – fall colours are popping. Find the right gear to hike now.
Unlock the secret to back to school success: warm, dry kids who play outside in any weather.
Need a hand? Book a free expert session to get up to speed on bike trainer apps and tech while you shop.
